data.name: Discord Black Theme [V1.0.7]
data.description: Is the default Discord dark theme not dark enough for you? Then try this style! This style makes Discord even darker. Warning: This style will break if you have the Light Theme enabled in Discord. Turn off the Light Theme in Discord to use this style!

data.name: MeteoFrance – I am not a tablet
data.description:
Shrink some elements on MeteoFrance weather forecast (new UI as of August 2020).
Because bank thinks that everyone is using its fat dirty fingers on a tablet, lazily lied in a couch.
This style tries to render the site usable again with a mouse and a brain.

Changelog
========

2020-08-06
=========
- Add support for hour canvas
- Shrink a bit more the time picker

2020-08-05
=========
Initial version
